main event: Observers reported seeing a bright red and white object, with a red tail, which broke into 4 pieces and disappeared during visual observation.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 100 seconds., The object appeared to be in level flight before disintegration., Observers described the object as having a trailing debris of small pieces before it completely disappeared., The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 29,000 feet., The sighting was documented in a military report from the Navy Department.
sighted object: a bright red and white object with a red tail
witness description: military personnel involved in the observation
